sentence: "At  a  recent  rally  on  downtown  Detroit's  riverfront,  thousands  called  for  a  cease-fire  in  the  Israel-Hamas  war,  which  began  after  Hamas  militants  killed  hundreds  of  Israelis  on  Oct.  7.
The  conflict  has  left  more  than  1,200  Israelis  and  11,300  Palestinians  dead,  according  to  Israeli  and  Gaza  officials.
